content: octavia octopus is a real snuggle monster each of her 8 arms is worked from the tip inward toward the body the 8 legs are joined and the head is worked upward to the crown **finished measurements ** height 18 leg length 24 **gauge ** 10 single_crochet x 10 row = 4 with mc and larger hook save time check your gauge **materials ** premier® yarns minikins™ chenille 100% polyester 1 76oz/50g 54yds/50m mc 2174-08 peony - 9 balls premier® yarns parfait® chunky 100% polyester 3 5oz/100g 131yds/1205m cc 1150-01 white 1 ball **hooks & notions ** us size j-10 6 mm and h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle removable stitch markers polyester stuffing small amount of black & white worsted weight yarn
